purpose: The email announces the 3rd International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications (iMETA 2025), scheduled for October 14-17, 2025, in Dubrovnik, Croatia. It highlights the conference's aim to bring together researchers, academics, and industry experts to discuss the metaverse's technologies and applications. The email also provides details about submission deadlines for papers and workshops, as well as publication opportunities through IEEE.
evidence_sentences: The 3rd International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications (iMETA 2025)

The International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications (iMETA) is to bring together leading researchers, academics, and industry experts to explore the various aspects of the distributive metaverse, including its technologies, applications, and implications for various industries.
Overall, the iMETA conference aims to provide attendees with a comprehensive understanding of the communication, computing, and system requirements of the metaverse.
All accepted papers in iMETA 2025 and the workshops co-located with it will be submitted to IEEEXplore, dblp and Scopus for inclusion.
